title: 108_s1184
content: Holocaust Victims' Assets, Restitution Policy, and Remembrance Act - Establishes the National Foundation for the Study of Holocaust Assets to: (1) serve as a centralized repository for research and information about Holocaust-era assets. (2) create tools to assist individuals and institutions to determine the ownership of Holocaust victims' assets and to enable claimants to obtain the speedy resolution of their personal property claims. And (3) work with private sector institutions to develop and promote common standards and best practices for research and information gathering on Holocaust-era assets.
